title: Can't post in play recruitment as a level 10.
body:
How long do I have to wait? It says level 7 but I'm level 10, not sure why.

If someone could help that would be awesome! (: I'd like to find friends to play with.

replies.body: Looks like posting here forced a sync through for your boards and summoner levels, so now you're showing up as level 10 here too! Should be able to freely post now ^_^

It seems that you haven't noticed yet, as you haven't posted elsewhere. But, since this was your first post, your information was synced and your level was updated. You should be able to post there now.
Thanks! Sorry slept all day, time to find friends to play with. c:
